block_comment: This block of code functions as a control mechanism for the 'cs_en0' and 'send_cmd0_row' signals. It enables the chip select signal 'cs_en0' and the row command signal 'send_cmd0_row' based on the condition of the signal 'sent_row_or_maint'. The signal latch updates on any change in 'sent_row_or_maint', hence, the signals 'cs_en0' and 'send_cmd0_row' mirror the value of 'sent_row_or_maint'. This is a part of the system's memory management operations.
